description:
It`s New Year`s Day and Keroro has hopes of winning Japan`s New Year`s postcard lottery, the space version, or both! Then, Giroro participates in a race held once every millennium to choose a new sign of the Space Zodiac. Keroro goes overboard in a bid to earn "The Year of Keron" and tries to help Giroro from the sidelines by cheating.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro, New Year`s Lucky Haste / Keroro, This Year Is Keron Year!
ケロロ 新年早々ラッキー / ケロロ 今年はケロン年!
